title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-1.1 - Foreword
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 257-1.1 - Foreword

State Regulations

Air quality standards are designed to provide protection
from the adverse health effects of air contamination; and they are intended
further to protect and conserve the natural resources and environment and to
promote maximum comfort and enjoyment and use of property consistent with the
economic and social well-being of the community. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
257-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register November 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 48, eff. 12/7/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
